description:
Steve Ross Talbot presents for the third segment in the Startup Series! Join us as we continue the third series of informative content from the experts.

Listen and Learn | Q&A | Excellent Discussion

In this session, Chief Technology Officer and Board Member, Steve Ross Talbot, shares his insights to raising funds. From the history of seeking direct funding from investors through the 90s and 00s with funding changes post-blockchain and onwards into a decentralised world and startup creation boom. What can we learn from the history of startup fund raising? How can this be applied to finding financing for your startup now?

The series will be exploring the people, process and technology challenges that startups face and how to overcome them. Inject speed and security into your product delivery, consolidate and drive efficiency at the same time as scaling and learn industry tips, tricks and knowledge that can be applied for your startup success.

Join the conversation in the Bunker now: https://join.slack.com/t/devops-bunker/shared_invite/zt-cy0rb3xx-SzRIiCenuWzfW7kqyr81zQ
title: Startup Series with Steve Ross Talbot "Raising Funds in a Decentralised World"
